.. _programs:

=========================
Executable programs
=========================

Here is a list of all executable programs that are installed with `dms_tools2`_. 
Once you install the `dms_tools2`_ package, all of these programs should be available to run at the command line:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   dms2_bcsubamp
   dms2_batch_bcsubamp
   dms2_prefs
   dms2_batch_prefs
   dms2_diffsel
   dms2_batch_diffsel
   dms2_fracsurvive
   dms2_batch_fracsurvive
   dms2_logoplot
